body:
- [**type/task**][**priority/high**] Switch groovy-maven-plugin to gmaven-plus plugin [#6826](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6826)
- [**type/bug**][**priority/high**][**area/rest**] X-Registry-Name header value ignored for v2 API 'create artifact' request with v3.1.1 server [#6818](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6818)
- [**type/bug**][**priority/high**][**area/sdk**] Access to v2 server using v2 client SDK in 3.1 fails on date parsing [#6799](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6799)
- [**type/enhancement**][**priority/normal**][**area/serdes**][**area/sdk/java**] Configured class types may not be loadable [#6792](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6792)
- [**type/bug**][**priority/normal**][**area/ui**] Opening the registry api doc ( /apis/registry/v3 ) fails with: Error downloading https://api-specifications/registry/v3/openapi.json NetworkError when attempting to fetch resource. [#6791](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6791)
- [**type/enhancement**][**priority/normal**][**area/sdk**] Publish custom artifact type JavaScript library to npmjs.com [#6778](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6778)
- [**type/enhancement**][**priority/normal**][**area/security**] Support PKCS12 certificate type in serdes client truststore properties [#6777](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6777)
- [**priority/normal**][**version/3.x**][**area/documentation**] Config table generation script might be broken [#6734](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6734)
- [**type/bug**][**priority/normal**][**area/rules/compatibility**][**area/compatibility/json-schema**] RuleViolationException for schemas with references multi-level [#6727](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6727)
- [**type/enhancement**][**priority/normal**][**area/ui**] Operator: add option to enable Studio functionality in Registry [#6694](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6694)
- [**Beginner Friendly**][**priority/normal**][**version/3.x**][**area/observability**] REST metrics are not recorded for all expected requests [#6592](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6592)
- [**type/bug**][**priority/normal**][**version/3.x**][**area/sdk**] [maven-plugin] When an AVRO schema contains optional records, autoreferences don't work [#6543](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6543)
- [**type/enhancement**][**priority/normal**][**area/serdes**][**version/3.x**] reduce extra copies in serdes deserialize [#6526](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6526)
- [**type/enhancement**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**][**area/sdk/java**][**version/3.x**] Allow configuring the Apicurio Client with PEM content [#6518](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6518)
- [**type/enhancement**][**priority/normal**][**area/serdes**][**version/3.x**] Add option to configure proxy settings [#6438](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6438)
- [**area/auth**][**version/2.6.x**] Proxy support for Apicurio Registry serializer/deserializer [#6042](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6042)
- [**type/enhancement**][**Beginner Friendly**][**area/serdes**] Configure Kafka serdes to use a cert (trust) when communicating with Apicurio [#3266](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3266)
